alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 29 at 9:08AM CDT until October 30 at 9:16PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Ellis and Kaufman Counties. Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Henderson and Navarro Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Rosser. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Moderate flooding is expected within the levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 35.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 31.0 feet. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday morning and continue falling throughout the week to near 5.0 feet by Friday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
